Taxonomy.Topic Description: Assistance with placing orders, selecting items, customization, and providing information on deals.
Inquiries about the status of orders, tracking delivery progress, estimated delivery time updates, and address confirmation.
Clarification on ingredients used, dietary restrictions, suggestions for vegetarian or vegan options, and nutritional information.
Handling late deliveries, missing items, incorrect orders, complaints about delivery personnel, and special delivery requests.
Assistance with payment methods, billing discrepancies, refund requests, and applying promo codes or vouchers.
Troubleshooting online ordering platform issues, login/account problems, browser compatibility, and mobile app support.
Dealing with complaints regarding food quality, packaging, presentation, and providing feedback on customer experience.
Handling requests for specific pizza customization, catering inquiries, dietary accommodations, and organizing group orders.
Enrollment in loyalty programs, points balance inquiries, redeeming rewards, and clarifying program terms and conditions.
Providing information on store locations, hours of operation, corporate inquiries, employment opportunities, and promotional events.

Taxonomy.Topic Description: Inquiries related to checking account, savings account, or credit card balances.
Disputes or discrepancies in transactions, such as unauthorized charges or incorrect amounts.
Help with online banking services, including login issues, password resets, or navigation assistance.
Questions or issues related to paying bills online, setting up automatic payments, or payment confirmation.
Assistance with mobile banking apps, troubleshooting app errors, or mobile deposit inquiries.
Requests or assistance with closing an account, including necessary steps and confirmation.
Reporting suspected fraud, unauthorized transactions, or phishing attempts.
Inquiries regarding interest rates on loans, savings accounts, or certificates of deposit (CDs).
Assistance with applying for a loan, questions about loan types, eligibility criteria, or application status.
Questions or requests for information about credit scores, credit reports, or credit monitoring services.
Requests for account statements, transaction history, or tax documents.
Requests for replacing lost, stolen, or damaged debit cards, credit cards, or ATM cards.
Inquiries about branch locations, operating hours, services offered, or appointments.
Assistance with investment accounts, retirement planning, stock trading, or portfolio management.
Questions or concerns about online security measures, account protection, or password security.
Inquiries about upgrading account types, benefits of premium accounts, or eligibility criteria.
Providing feedback, suggestions, or complaints about the banking services or customer experience.
Questions or assistance regarding tax documents, reporting interest income, or tax-related forms.
Reporting lost or stolen checks, placing stop payments, or reissuing checks.
Requests for reinstating a closed or suspended account, including necessary steps and documentation.
